job_details.Functieomschrijving:
AI/ML Full Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

   At AND, we accelerate the development of digital capabilities. In practice, that means helping ambitious leaders and organisations build the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.

   Clients rely on our experience, agility and craft skills across tech and business strategy, software development and product management to address some of the toughest challenges facing their businesses.

   We bring aboard thinkers, tinkerers, passionate software craftspeople and inspiring technologists to help us solve these challenges. Together, we're united by a sense of pragmatism, purpose and a deeply-held belief that digital products and technology alone won't transform a business or save the world: it's the people that count.

   About You

   As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
     *
          + Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
          + Proficiency in Python and Javascript
          + Proficiency in researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
          + Experience working in Azure
          + Solid understanding of vector databases (Azure Cognitive Search, FAISS, Pinecone, etc..)
          + Experience working with GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)
          + Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
          + Understanding of MLOps best practices.
          + Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
          + Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

   It's helpful if you also have:
     * Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps
     * A keen interest in industry best-practice around standards, quality and continuous improvement in the field of Data Science (AI/GenAI/ML)
     * Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics
     * Experience of using modern and traditional data technologies including: ElasticSearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mySQL/mariaDB, etc..

   Language Proficiency
     * Dutch speaker is strongly preferred

   Joining AND

   From the work we deliver, to the way we serve and support our people, we work hard to ensure that there's nowhere quite like AND. But joining a company is a two-way street: the fit has to work on both sides. So before you apply, here's three key things to understand about us:
     * We're built for people - like, real humans. Not 'resources' or 'staff'. That means happiness and wellbeing really do matter to us, and we hate unnecessary hierarchy and bureaucracy.
     * There's no well-trodden path ahead: AND is growing fast and forging a new trail. That's exciting, and gives us all the autonomy and opportunity we love - but bear in mind it also demands focus, patience and resilience.
     * Diversity is a priority. After all, to build great products that a wide variety of different people love to use, we need a wide variety of people to help us build them. So diversity is more than a policy or a word: it's business critical for us.

   Still sound good? Great! Fill out the short application form below and we'll be in touch.

   Over het bedrijf:
   AND Digital
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

AI/ML Full Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

   At AND, we accelerate the development of digital capabilities. In practice, that means helping ambitious leaders and organisations build the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.

   Clients rely on our experience, agility and craft skills across tech and business strategy, software development and product management to address some of the toughest challenges facing their businesses.

   We bring aboard thinkers, tinkerers, passionate software craftspeople and inspiring technologists to help us solve these challenges. Together, we're united by a sense of pragmatism, purpose and a deeply-held belief that digital products and technology alone won't transform a business or save the world: it's the people that count.

   About You

   As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:

          + Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
          + Proficiency in Python and Javascript
          + Proficiency in researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
          + Experience working in Azure

          + Understanding of MLOps best practices.

     * Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps

     * Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics
     * Experience of using modern and traditional data technologies including: ElasticSearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mySQL/mariaDB, etc..

     * Dutch speaker is strongly preferred

   Joining AND

     * Diversity is a priority. After all, to build great products that a wide variety of different people love to use, we need a wide variety of people to help us build them. So diversity is more than a policy or a word: it's business critical for us.

   Still sound good? Great! Fill out the short application form below and we'll be in touch.

   Over het bedrijf:
   AND Digital

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Generative AI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, LangChain), fine-tuning LLMs, building RAG systems (implied by vector database usage), and developing RESTful ML model APIs. While it mentions traditional ML model development, the focus on GenAI tools and frameworks, along with the need to build and maintain production-grade APIs for these models, aligns most closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models' directly relates to the core activities of model development and refinement.
job_tasks.phrase: researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)' indicates direct work with generative models and their associated frameworks.
job_tasks.phrase: GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn' lists specific tools used for model development and experimentation.
job_tasks.phrase: AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn

job_tasks.justification: The requirement for 'building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs' is a core software development task for exposing ML models as services.
job_tasks.phrase: building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Understanding of MLOps best practices' directly refers to the operational aspects of deploying and managing ML models.
The phrase 'Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps' indicates a need for skills in deploying, monitoring, and maintaining systems, which is central to MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics' suggests involvement in data-related tasks necessary for ML/GenAI projects.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies' implies understanding client business needs and translating them into technical ML strategies.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues' and 'Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team' indicates mentoring and technical guidance, which requires strong communication.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'united by a sense of pragmatism' directly points to this soft skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues
Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team
A keen interest in industry best-practice around standards, quality and continuous improvement in the field of Data Science (AI/GenAI/ML)
